storyInfo: Paprika's mercenary team is on their way to Londinium.

attributes.content: How's she doing?
attributes.name: Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: She's still here, following along.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: You know what a stubborn runt she is.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Try to talk to her again...
attributes.name: Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: Damn it, Grimm, you're going senile, aren't you?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: If you're going to regret it now, why did you even bring her here?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Cut the crap.
attributes.name: Grimm

attributes.content: We were in sticky situation with that deal at the black market. Both of them moneybags wanted each other dead. And with the merch gone, they'd only blame us for the mess.
attributes.name: Grimm

attributes.content: If we hadn't brought the kid with us, she would've died in the city.
attributes.name: Grimm

attributes.content: I know that, but now you're chasing her away, and she's got nowhere to go.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Just gotta find her a random town... As long as there's work, there's still a way out for her.
attributes.name: Grimm

attributes.content: You really believe that?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: I mean it. For her sake, you should just train her. Has she ever seen blood? I mean real blood, not a couple hornbeasts getting slaughtered.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Grimm, enough daydreaming. We're already on our way to Londinium. We'll run into more clashes.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: And she's a Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Yeah. Shut up already.
attributes.name: Grimm

attributes.content: I know what to do with her.
attributes.name: Grimm

attributes.text: He's not the first one to try to talk me into this, and I know he won't be the last.
Am I too soft on that Paprika kid? I'll admit it. Maybe a little.
When the rotten girl came onboard a few years ago, she was still a kid, through and through. She lost her parents and had to make a living to keep herself and her grandma back home from going hungry.
I figured I'd take care of her some, given how young she was.
When I was her age...
Whenever I had nothing to eat, I had to pluck out all the metal trinkets from the dead bodies' at the burial sites. A bag got me a big loaf of bread.
When you think about it like that, life may still be tough for kids these days, but they have it much better than our generation.
They've got food, clothes, and the strength to scream about how unfair Columbia treats the Sarkaz—What do kids like her know?
Does she know what this trip to Londinium is about?
Hah, like hell she would.
Her little punk ass hasn't even seen Kazdel for real.

attributes.content: Jerk, jerk... you great big jerk...
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Treating me like a kid again... I'll make you regret this someday!
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Hey.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: —! A raid?!
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: If this was a raid, you'd be dead already.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Oh... what? Don't scare me like that.
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: I don't have time to come scare you. You're scaring yourself, not being alert enough.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: I'm a medic. I wasn't that good at fighting to begin with.
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Besides, I was... I was thinking about things. That's why I didn't notice.
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Fine, whatever you say.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: So? Still mad about Old Grimm?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Hmph... Of course!
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: He wanted me off the team now? Don't you think that's awful?
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Ugh.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: I'm a merc. I'm part of the team. Why'd he want me gone?
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Why doesn't he want me to come with you guys to Londinium? I've been on so many missions with you!
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: This gig's different.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: I don't see what's so special about it... It's a bit far, but there's lots of money in it!
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: If there's one thing that's not the same as usual...
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: It's when Grimm came back that day and said we had to pack and leave right away. I'd never seen him so worked up.
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Usually, nothing matters to him, but not then. He even said that if we win this time, we'll have a much better future.
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Is that true?
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Who knows?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: I just want my money up front. The rest I haven't thought about.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Eh, that's fair.
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Grimm thinks I don't know nothing, but what does it matter as long as we make money?
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: As long as Nana doesn't go hungry, all gigs are the same. What else do I have to know?
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: If we really get that much money... I want to buy Nana a better house. The place she's living in now has a leaky roof, and she keeps telling me her knees hurt.
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Oh, right. If Grimm wants one, I could even buy him a decent birthday present.
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: You want to celebrate his birthday? Does he even remember something as pointless as his birthday?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: How is that pointless? It's like the opposite of pointless!
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: If you don't remind yourself every year, you might just forget that a year has come and gone, that you've gotten a year bigger, a year older.
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Doesn't that sound scary to you?
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Kinda?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: What kind of lame answer is that?
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Fine, whatever you say.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: The way I see it, if you told Grimm himself what you just told me, he might just agree... No, he might even be less inclined to let you follow us.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Huh? What's that mean...?
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: (And I was going to convince her to leave...)
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: (Forget it.)
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Never mind. Keep following, then. I'm heading back to the front.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Sheesh, what's with that? I hate people who don't finish their thoughts.
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Acting all mysterious...
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: The man has already walked away. There are roughly twenty men in the team up ahead. Paprika can only faintly make out the shadow of the last man in the group.
The girl stays quiet for a moment. She looks down and pulls something out of her pocket.
A finger sleeve made of wool and bright in color.
Grimm's definitely gonna say it looks too colorful.
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Well, what does it matter? It looks prettier when it's colorful.
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: If he tells me to go away one more time...
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: I won't give him his present!
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: (What's that noise?)
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: (Was that just my imagination?)
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Who's there? Come out!
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Hmph!
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Got you!
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Who are you? And what are you after?
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Hey, you—
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Wait... Don't even think about it!
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Huff... hah...
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: G-Got you...!
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: I never expected a young lass like you would spot me.
attributes.name: Black Market Brawler

attributes.content: What does that make you? You got yourself caught by a young lass.
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: You won't get away. Now spill it! Who are you?!
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Hah, what a naive kid. I'll admit you're not half bad. The Sarkaz really live up to their reputation.
attributes.name: Black Market Brawler

attributes.content: But you...
attributes.name: Black Market Brawler

attributes.content: It doesn't matter how good a naive, boneheaded kid fights. It doesn't change the fact that you're a kid.
attributes.name: Black Market Brawler

attributes.content: Why you...!
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: (No, Paprika. He's provoking you on purpose... Don't fall for it. Calm down.)
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: I'm warning you. Don't you try to buy time with stupid stuff.
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Now answer my question, if you know what's good for you!
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Here's a free lesson, Sarkaz punk.
attributes.name: Black Market Brawler

attributes.content: Answer me!
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: If you know someone's stalling, you shouldn't hang around and let things drag out—
attributes.name: Black Market Brawler

attributes.content: What? You...
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Are you done yet?
attributes.name: Black Market Brawler B

attributes.content: Having a nice chat with your new girlfriend, are you?
attributes.name: Black Market Brawler B

attributes.content: Shit! Y-You...
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: —Do it!
attributes.name: Black Market Brawler

attributes.content: Dammit! You... crooked sons of bitches!
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: (No, if both of them attack at once... I can't dodge!)
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Ugh!
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Eyes open! Look at your opponent. Raise your weapon and block!
attributes.name: Grimm

attributes.content: Ungh!
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Ugh, here comes the nasty bastard.
attributes.name: Black Market Brawler

attributes.content: Don't worry about anyone else. Focus on your target.
attributes.name: Grimm

attributes.content: Don't worry about getting hurt. In battle, never let go of your weapon!
attributes.name: Grimm

attributes.content: Yes, sir!
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Don't you underestimate me!
attributes.name: Black Market Brawler B

attributes.content: Now! Attack!
attributes.name: Grimm

attributes.content: Haah!
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Gah!
attributes.name: Black Market Brawler

attributes.content: Hah... Haah! Don't underestimate you?
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Right back at you—You jerks. Don't—Don't underestimate me!
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Hah, where're you aiming at, punk?!
attributes.name: Black Market Brawler B

attributes.content: What are you doing?!
attributes.name: Grimm

attributes.content: Have you forgotten everything I've taught you?! Aim for his vitals!
attributes.name: Grimm

attributes.content: I-I know...!
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Haaaaagh—!
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: *pant*... *pant*...
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: *pant*...
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Got them.
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Grimm!
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: You see that? I took them both down myself!
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Grimm...?
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: What's wrong? A-Are you mad?
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: What did I teach you before?
attributes.name: Grimm

attributes.content: Don't underestimate the enemy, don't hold back, and aim for the enemy's vitals in one go.
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: And what were you doing?
attributes.name: Grimm

attributes.content: I... I didn't miss on purpose. I... uh...
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: I mean, you're here. It's not a problem.
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: What if... in the future, I'm not around?
attributes.name: Grimm

attributes.content: But why would you ever not be around?
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: No one sticks around forever. Don't be stupid.
attributes.name: Grimm

attributes.content: Ugh...
attributes.name: Black Market Brawler

attributes.content: They're still alive?
attributes.name: Grimm

attributes.content: Uh... yeah. I-I knocked them out...
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Why didn't you kill them outright?
attributes.name: Grimm

attributes.content: Well...
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: That's not really necessary, right...?
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Hey, how about I tie them up?
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: That way, they can't call for help...
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.text: Sometimes I wonder.
What exactly can I teach a kid like her?
Should I teach her how to become a 'real Sarkaz merc?' Should I teach her those so-called rules I've put together from my experiences?
Would she really accept anything I teach her and eventually grow up to become the kind of Sarkaz I've met aplenty. The kind of Sarkaz like me?
That's definitely not a future I'd look forward to.
But if I teach her nothing...
A naive Sarkaz like her will have no future.

attributes.content: Paprika.
attributes.name: Grimm

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Watch carefully.
attributes.name: Grimm

attributes.content: The old mercenary unsheathes the sharp blade he is carrying at his waist and drives it into the defeated men's throats as the young girl watches.
Their red blood spatters onto Paprika's knees and her shoes; the scalding heat seeps through the fabric and reaches her skin.
But... Why...?
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: They're from the black market, and they came for us.
attributes.name: Grimm

attributes.content: If I hadn't noticed their movement just now, it could've been you who was lying on the ground here.
attributes.name: Grimm

attributes.content: I know!
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: I know they were up to no good! And that if it wasn't for you, I would've been in danger...
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: There's one more. He's my quarry. I'll end him.
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: (I need to kill him... Right, I have to.)
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: (Just stab him. Relax, Paprika. This isn't hard...)
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: ...Phew...
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: What are you hesitating for?
attributes.name: Grimm

attributes.content: I'm not...!
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: (I'm not hesitating... I'm a merc. This is just killing... just killing my enemy!)
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: (What is there to hesitate about? I... I...)
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: I'll waste him right now... right now!
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: That's enough.
attributes.name: Grimm

attributes.content: What? But Grimm, I still haven't—
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: You can't bring yourself to do it.
attributes.name: Grimm

attributes.content: No! Trust me... I can!
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: You still don't understand a thing.
attributes.name: Grimm

attributes.content: If you can't even kill a man like him, I can say for sure there is no future for you as a merc.
attributes.name: Grimm

attributes.content: You will die soon. Dying on a battlefield somewhere is still a half-decent outcome, but you could die somewhere that doesn't even matter, and I'd have to go collect your body.
attributes.name: Grimm

attributes.content: But I am a merc!
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: All of us mercs will die one day. Didn't you say that yourself?
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: All of us?
attributes.name: Grimm

attributes.content: Hah, you're not one of us.
attributes.name: Grimm

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Grimm, sometimes, I'm scared...
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Of what?
attributes.name: Grimm

attributes.content: Just like you said, it could've been me who got killed here today. If it wasn't for you, I would've been killed for sure.
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: It could take you guys a long time to find me, and then it'd take an even longer time for Nana back home to find out.
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: That's what happened when Fred died. I still remember.
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Death and parting are a normal part of life.
attributes.name: Grimm

attributes.content: Yeah... I know. You always say that.
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: I'm not scared of dying. I really am not.
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: But I'm scared of keeping Nana waiting for me to go home, even if I won't ever make it back.
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: I'll let you off this time.
attributes.name: Grimm

attributes.content: Grimm...! No, wait, I really can—
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: I've seen enough of this charade. We're done here.
attributes.name: Grimm

attributes.content: But, kid, remember this. If you follow us, sooner or later you will run into a situation where you gotta kill.
attributes.name: Grimm

attributes.content: Yeah... I get it...
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Do you now? I don't see it.
attributes.name: Grimm

attributes.content: This might end up killing you.
attributes.name: Grimm

attributes.content: Paprika.
attributes.name: Grimm

attributes.content: Don't go to Londinium. You're not cut out for it.
attributes.name: Grimm

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Didn't you say that as long as we win this war, we'll have a better future?
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: I can fight. I will definitely be helpful!
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: This is about more than just fighting.
attributes.name: Grimm

attributes.content: I'm putting everything on the line for this mission. Because I've seen it before.
attributes.name: Grimm

attributes.content: Seen what before?
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: I've seen us Sarkaz with a home.
attributes.name: Grimm

attributes.content: Home...
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Maybe it won't be all that good, but as long as there's a shred of hope, I'm willing to fight for it.
attributes.name: Grimm

attributes.content: But you're different. You still have a choice.
attributes.name: Grimm

attributes.content: I... I have a choice?
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: I don't know...
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Where else could I go, if I don't go with you?
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: I want to head back to my hometown and live my days like before, but... can we really do that?
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.text: I know what kind of path I'm on.
Becoming a merc is never a Sarkaz's choice, but throwing yourself into war is. Setting out on this journey is the best and only choice I have.
The kid says she's not scared of dying.
I didn't argue.
I know it's not that she's not afraid. She never had the chance to understand and never faced anything like that before.
Fear has always kept at bay two kinds of men:
One is like me, and the other like her.

attributes.content: I've thought about this before. This mission in Londinium will be harder than all the missions we've been on, right?
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Maybe.
attributes.name: Grimm

attributes.content: One day, you might collapse on the ground somewhere and lose your life just like that.
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Yeah.
attributes.name: Grimm

attributes.content: In that case, I'm not gonna prepare a birthday present ahead of time next year.
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Here. Your present for this year.
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: A finger glove?
attributes.name: Grimm

attributes.content: Don't you say it's too colorful, a waste of time, or that it's not something you need!
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: I-I'm not gonna be sad if you die. I promise you. Death and parting is nothing to us Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: But if we can avoid dying... even if we get the living hell beaten out of us, even if we don't get paid...
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: None of that matters. I won't even be bothered if we don't earn a single dime after this long trip!
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: At the very least...
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: I hope we'll all come back together after the mission is over.
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: How naive.
attributes.name: Grimm

attributes.content: Are all young Sarkaz these days this naive? My kind of Sarkaz never think like that.
attributes.name: Grimm

attributes.content: Why are you digging at me again?!
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Can't Sarkaz wish for the people around them to be safe?
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: That's really how I feel... and I'm a Sarkaz!
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Sarkaz like you die on the battlefield.
attributes.name: Grimm

attributes.content: And I'd rather not have your death on my conscience, kid.
attributes.name: Grimm

attributes.content: Let's go.
attributes.name: Grimm

attributes.content: What's that supposed to mean...? Hey, wait for me!
attributes.name: Paprika
